name: 0x3d Engine
short_description:
0x3d is an attempt at writing a futureproof OpenGL-based 3D engine. Thus, I try to squeeze as much as possible from modern OpenGL features which can enhance code performance and/or manageability. The base profile chosen is OpenGL 4.x Core, mostly for its architectural improvements. For development setups, 4.3 is partly relied upon for its debug capabilities.

Also, for development purposes the reference hardware is deliberately chosen from the slower end, preferably the slowest thing one has available with the chosen OpenGL profile support. Currently it is a GeForce 400 series, GTS 450 in particular.
summary: 0x3d is an attempt at writing a futureproof OpenGL-based 3D engine
